ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars RPG
ygData.msgSnippet: *After Kamodia came out of the room where she layed several blankets on the shivering Dinobot, she heard someone crying and came to see it was Plintissa*

From: "ilovealllizards" <ilovealllizards@...>

*After Kamodia came out of the room where she layed several blankets on the
shivering Dinobot, she heard someone crying and came to see it was
Plintissa* *Kamodia bends down on her knees* Kamodia: Plintissa, what's
wrong? *Kamodia asks her when she see's the large puddle of tears spreading
across the floor*
----- Original Message -----
From: "THECODE" <thecode@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, June 24, 2000 3:53 AM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars RPG


> OCC: This is a long post, everyone please read the whole thing, I put alot
> of time into this post, it's one of my best posts ever. None of this post
is
> moding, Plintissa's memories are really how it happened.
>
> Plintissa walked closer to Iron Raptor.
>
> "Iron Raptor...Goodbye." Plintissa walked out of the room, walking down
into
> the main room of the Maximal base, just standing in the center of the
room.
> Apparently, Iron Raptor is in love. Plintissa cried, she was in love as
> well, but her love had changed, for the better in power, for the worst
> overall. Then Plintissa remembered what Suukie had once said to her, the
> memory echoed in her head...
>
> In Plintissa's memory, the Maximals were all against her, and her only
> friend was also against her. Plintissa sat down in her base, Suukie in the
> CR Chamber, the one sentence that started up their conversation.
>
> "Don't worry about those Maximal fools, I think your cool."
>
> Once they grew to love each other, right before Plintissa left for the
> Maximal base, that was the next memory.
>
> "I have to leave now Suukie, but I'll be back after I sort this out with
> Iron Raptor and that idiot Liono, I just wish that Iron Raptor would
return
> my calls." Plintissa sighed and walked toward the door.
>
> "Don't be blue, I love you!" Came Suukie's screwed up mind's rhyming
voice.
> Plintissa smiled and walked out the door.
>
> "I love you too." Plintissa said as she walked out.
>
> Plintissa remembered and cried harder. Plintissa dropped to the floor,
> making a puddle of tears in front of everyone, since she had no room in
the
> Maximal base, she never did have one, she was always trying to help
out.She
> terribly missed Iron Raptor, Dracona sometimes was close to her, but
Dracona
> was always so far away mentally that it was impossible for them to be
> friends. Plintissa remembered whan she first met Iron Raptor, and when she
> first met Suukie.
>
> "Hey! I found a stasis pod out here! Doesn't anyone care?" Plintissa had
> yelled. That's when she appeared. Iron Raptor. She came outside of the
base,
> she was looking at a library, but was interupted by Plintissa's screaming.
> Plintissa remembered what Iron Raptor had said.
>
> "Temper, temper." Were Iron Raptor's first words to her. Iron Raptor and
> Plintissa joked around and they fixed the stasis pod. Out emerged a big
> plecostomus, Suukie. Suukie instantly ran off after saying hello to the 2,
> running off to help someone, which Plintissa later learned were Dinobot
and
> Tavatron, who were now good friends. Iron raptor said one word after
> Plintissa ran away to join battle.
>
> "You SQUID!" Were Iron Raptor's words, Iron Raptor and Plintissa had a
close
> encounter with Rampage, where Iron Raptor saved Plintissa's life, while
> Plintisssa passed out from pain. Iron Raptor was premoted to 3rd in
command,
> Plintissa didn't even get a position in the Maximal army, but stuck around
> anyway. Plintissa had several run-ins with Liono after that, and had
> challenged him, but he did not accept, and like the coward that he was, at
> least to Plintissa, he ran from her and sicked Key on her. Plintissa
ignored
> Key completely, she was angry. Plintissa then made her own group, and
that's
> where it all came in now, Suukie is dead, her group is dead, and her
> friendship with Iron Raptor was dead. In short words, Plintissa's long
life,
> from Pred, to Maxi, to Populist, was now and forever, over. Plintissa
weeped
> on the floor...
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "Iron Raptor" <ironraptor13@...>
> To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
> Sent: Friday, June 23, 2000 6:09 PM
> Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars RPG
>
>
>
>
> * Iron Raptor smiled as she saw Prowl's weak smile but concern eventually
> made it's way to her optics, worried for the pain that his broken ribs
> caused. The kiss on her cheek reminded her of the same kisses that they
had
> shared in her quarters only a mega-cycle and a half ago, wishing that she
> could rewind time and try to prevent his damage. Half closing her optics
in
> a way that meant that ,"knowing" way when he replied to her statement of
> not being able to handle her cure for pain. But she then saw Prowl nearly
> lose his balance and was ready to stop him from falling if needed, he was
so
> hurt and that fact hurt her just as much then.causing her casual look to
> become concern.
> Him then stumbling back as Shadow Cat came up to them causing her to come
> closer to him in worry, how could a few broken ribs cause him to act like
> this?
> Soon the pains of her own damage was over ruled by concern as Prowl takes
a
> step towards a CR chamber but doesn't quite make it! Seeing him almost cry
> out in pain Iron Raptor rushed to his side just in time to hear the hiss
and
> pop of his damage, then seeing him slump to the floor and his repair
system
> begin to activate.
> With a quick rush of movement she bent down to him and then took him under
> the arms, with the full weight of his damaged body being to heavy she
simply
> pulled him over to a wall beside a  chamber and then sat him up against
it.
> Iron Raptor put a worried hand on Prowl's cheek as she looked into his
face
> and kneeled beside him, expressionless and without emotion as he stayed in
> his nearly unconscious state.
> She brushed her thumb over his lips before leaning in close and placing
her
> own cheek against his other one, the act simply for comfort to let him
know
> that she was there with him in his time of need. His repair system
obviously
> working but the pain might not be fully gone yet, her own presence there
for
> him to deal with that.
> Her free hand stoked his shoulder for a moment before resting on his arm,
> her voice soft and smooth as not to cause him alarm or suddenly surprise
> him.not knowing if he even knew that she was there now.beside him. *
>
> " I'm here, Prowl.My Love. As I'll always be."
>
> * Then with a slightly worried sigh but one of slight relaxation she
stayed
> by his side, waiting for a positive response from the only bot she ever
> loved. *
>
>
